body.name: CROSSON ETL listed Commercial Double Deck 16 inch Countertop Electric Pizza Oven with pizza stone, Multipurpose Indoor Pizza oven for Restaurant use,120V/3200W
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 10 mins
features: COOKING PIZZAS UP TO 16" : For the best performance and even cooking, this oven is recommended for thin-crust pizzas cooked at 550 degrees for 6-8 minutes. This method ensures that pizzas are fully cooked with even leoparding on the crust.
Literally Independent Double Deck:No more anxieties about busy shift

INTELLIGENT Cavity Design,INTELLIGENT COOKING : NOT only The Large heating elements span the full cavity to reduce the need to rotate pizzas during the cooking process,BUT ALSO oven light equipped allow you and your staff better understand cooking status.

Precise Deck Control : Independent upper and lower temperature control allow you to select right temperature for wide range of food,60-minitue timer with audible alarm ensure perfect results every time.It becomes so easy to Manage and keep track of your orders.

Durable Construction : The durable stainless steel exterior, plus the aluminized steel interiors of each cavity making it possible for this oven to resist the rigors of a commercial environment while remaining easy to clean.In addition,Full insulation on all six sides ,both main housing and door ,provides consistent interior temperatures and maintain cool exterior temperatures.
SAFE TO USE : ETLus and ETLsanitation certified，safety and sanitation becomes a sure thing.

COOKING UNDER CONTROL:View window on door and oven light equipped allow you and your staff to better understand cooking status. FULLY INSULATED : Full insulation on all six sides ,both main housing and door ,provides consistent interior temperatures and maintain cool exterior temperatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected. Perfect for small scale pizza stand.
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this oven but decided to try it out. Similar double oven units are generally 3-10 times the price.I have been running the oven for 90+ days so now I can confidently write this review.Bottom line is this oven is much more than I expected. For the price I figured I was going to get some kind of a residential grade unit re-packaged and sold as commercial grade. I was wrong. This machine (I bought the double oven) is all commercial grade.Stainless Steel outer has held up perfectly. Cleans easily and no discoloration due to heat. Doors and handles are all still tight with no loosening. Knobs, lights, thermostat all working exactly as designed.The only problem to report was the oven arrived with a broken pizza stone. I don't think this was a fault of the manufacturer because the box showed signs of an overly aggressive shipping company. Regardless, seller was super fast to respond to my email (literally only a couple hours) and shipped replacement stones right away.Oven has been in use in our sports arena concession stand for just over three months days. We have cooked several hundred pizzas and have zero problems to report. Temps are very consistent and the stone cooked crust is better than anything we ever did with a pan and an oven.Overall an excellent experience and will happily do business with these folks again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for indoors, except Alaska!
reviews.reviewText: THIS is IT !! Was considering a lesser item, but saw the features I wanted here. This makes a pizzeria quality pie every time. A few things: it puts out lots of heat--mine went into the garage, 4" from nearest walls, made a heat shield to go in back of it--safe. Recommended heat setting is 525F--too hot, made crust hard. I went to my usual setting of 425F, 8 mins, rotate 180 degrees--perfect--may cook a little faster now. Used a Walmart 13", fresh 5-cheese pie, added my own topping of diced bell pepper, no meat, removed excess cheese--perfecto!Stone is a little thin but works OK, use care with it. May change my name to Luigi!! JW, Las Vegas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Oven broke after 4 months
reviews.reviewText: I bought this oven back in September and the top oven has already completely died. Unfortunately I am past the return or product support window even though I have only had it for 4 months. I don't recommend this oven.

reviews.reviewerName: me myself and Ime myself and I
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There are two temp settings per oven. I mistakenly set just one and it didn’t get as hot as expected. Once I learned my error it worked flawlessly. One of the stones had a crack in it. They replaced it. Good customer service so far. I look forward to making thousands of pizzas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my wedding
reviews.reviewText: Pizza oven cooked great artisan style pizza, leoparding on the crust, absolutely no flop. This pizza oven get a 9.3 out of 10.1 bite everyone knows the rules.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good choice.
reviews.reviewText: This oven does not heat to the set temperature. I made fresh cinnamon buns and set it for 350 for 20 minutes. They were completely raw and had to leave them for 30 mins at max temperature so they would start to raise. They came out burned on top and still raw in the middle, a disaster. When cooking pizzas it had to be at the max temperature and took ages to heat up. Pretty much this over is useless for anything other than to rack up your electricity bill to cook an average pizza. The front sticker became discolored with an off white color. Sent it back and got a NuWave iq360 and cooks everything amazingly quickly and well.
I have now been using this pizza oven for about five months.It works great.I am very pleased.Half hour warm up and five minutes to cook a pizza.
